text: @realDonaldTrump You are a dangerous, evil toddler. Covid-19 is a killer, not just old people, (as if that wasn’t enough) it kills everyone, rich people, poor people and yes even republicans.  Millions dead doesn’t improve the economy. Your greed is, there are no words to describe it. Fuck you.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
